shortdesc.ph: Starts an audio recording on the client.

dlentry.dd: This method is obsolete from v2.9.1, and its default recording sampling rate is 32 kHz, which cannot be modified. Please use the new method instead.

section.p:
The SDK allows recording during a call. After successfully calling this method, you can record the audio of all the users in the channel and get an audio recording file.
.wav: Large file size with high fidelity.
.aac: Small file size with low fidelity.
Ensure that the directory for the log files exists and is writable. This interface needs to be called later. Once the user leaves the channel, the recording automatically stops.

plentry.pd: The absolute path (including the suffixes of the filename) of the recording file. For example: C:\music\audio.aac.
